about_the_game:
Downhill Girl is a third-person riding game. You can choose your favorite game character in the game, then choose a suitable bicycle according to the track you choose, and then have an exciting downhill ride. trip.
In different maps, you can enjoy the beautiful scenery of the mountains all the way, discover check-in points in the game, and complete tasks on different tracks. You can challenge timed races, earn new vehicles, and unlock different characters. I hope you can have fun in this dense mountain forest.
detailed_description:
Downhill Girl is a third-person riding game. You can choose your favorite game character in the game, then choose a suitable bicycle according to the track you choose, and then have an exciting downhill ride. trip.
In different maps, you can enjoy the beautiful scenery of the mountains all the way, discover check-in points in the game, and complete tasks on different tracks. You can challenge timed races, earn new vehicles, and unlock different characters. I hope you can have fun in this dense mountain forest.
name: Downhill Girl Demo
short_description: This is the perfect time to show off your driving skills. Challenge yourself on thrilling downhill journeys in different mountains and forests. You will travel through narrow mountain roads and jump off cliffs. Enjoy this moment to the fullest.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
